127501.name: Schweine Schwarte Fliiiiiiiiiieg!
127501.description: A kind of "Musical pig" game. It consists of a fluffy pig. When you press the belly, music will start to play. The players stand or sit in a circle and someone presses the pig's belly, then tosses the pig to another player who has to catch it and throw it to the next player as fast as possible. The player who holds the pig when the music stops is out. Continue play until only one player remains. That player is the winner.

127502.name: CityProGame Nürnberg
127502.description:
Objective: Using the detailed street map of Nürnberg each player is given five companies to be established in the city as close to the centre as possible.

With the help of dice and counters, each players chooses where to place, turn or remove company tiles.
Once a company is established on the map, the corresponding four 'places worth seeing' are revealed, so familiarizing players with the sights of the city.

Contents: 80 cards, 8 counters, 3 dice, rules and city information.

127503.name: CityProGame Karlsruhe
127503.description:
Objective: Using the detailed street map of Karlsruhe each player is given five companies to be established in the city as close to the centre as possible.

With the help of dice and counters, each players chooses where to place, turn or remove company tiles.
Once a company is established on the map, the corresponding four 'places worth seeing' are revealed, so familiarizing players with the sights of the city.

Contents: 80 cards, 8 counters, 3 dice, rules and city information.

127504.name: Ach, du dickes Ei!
127504.description:
Findus has birthday three times per year. And every time Petterson bakes him a pancake cake. But this time he is still lacking 5 eggs - who can get hold of them first?

Players choose a basket of eggs on the board and then search the eggs with matching color. If the underside of an egg shows the wrong color, it is returned back to the board without showing the color to the other players. The first player to have found his five eggs is the winner.

In the second variant a die is rolled, then an egg matching the rolled color is sought, and if both match, the egg is placed in the player's basket. If the die shows Petterson, one can put any egg from the board in his basket. If it shows Findus, one egg has to be returned from the basket to the board. The first player to fill his basket is the winner.

127505.name: Buffalo
127505.description:
How fast can you name a vain artist? How about a glasses-wearing heartthrob? What do a flamboyant popstar, a blind scientist, and a skinny superhero have in common? You'd better think fast, or your fellow player will leave you buffaloed.

In each round of Buffalo, players race to make matches using cards on the table. Be the first to shout out the name of a real person or fictional character who matches the descriptors on two or more word cards, claim the matched cards, and continue flipping. When the deck runs out, the player with the most cards wins.

127506.description: Prepare for awkwardness! Each round in Awkward Moment puts 3-8 players in terrifically awkward social situations. Take turns being the Decider. Draw a moment Card to a reveal hysterical, embarrassing, or stressful situation. Use the Decider Card to determine the basis for a winning Reaction. Impress the Decider by submitting the best response from your hand!
127506.name: Awkward Moment

127507.name: QuestLord
127507.description:
A Classic Style Computer Role Playing Game for Mobile Devices that pits your character into the role of the one who seeks to be the QuestLord.

During the battles of the Elf Lords, the Realm of Alteus has been thrown into chaos and despair. The wrongs of mortals and unnatural magics shall be righted by just one, The QuestLord.

Source: The Game Website.

127508.name: Block 5: The Card Game
127508.description: Block 5: The Card Game consists of cards numbered 1-10, but without 5s and with a few marked 3+. The goal is to get rid of one's cards. At the start of the game, players lay out rows with the sum of five (1,2,2, for instance). When a player adds the fifth row, s starts a new block by placing an individual card on the table. This card shows the number which has to be added up to. A player who cannot place a row draws a card. A player who places a 3+ card draws three cards, keeps one and gives the other two to two other players. The first player to get rid of all her cards wins.

127509.name: Gandalf the Sorceror
127509.description:
From the cassette inlay (ZX Spectrum Edition)

Defend the castle against dragons, collect the gold, rescue the apprentices, AND take the latest YOPS course...SORCERY

3D ARCADE ACTION with MAGICAL ANIMATION


User Summary

Gandalf the Sorcerer was initially written by Frank Cecere and published by Tymac Software for the Commodore 64. It was subsequently converted to the ZX Spectrum by Software Conversions Ltd and renamed Sodov the Sorcerer.

The user plays the Sorcerer behind the walls of his castle, which is under siege by dragons. You control a cursor and if you get it on top of a dragon and press fire, your magic will turn the dragon into gold!

If you fail to shoot the dragons, then they will slowly attempt to open your portcullis and if successful will invade your castle and steal one of your three apprentices.

Your magical power is reduced every time you fire, but can be replenished by going to the top of one of two towers on either side of the screen.

In order to collect the gold, you have to allow one of your apprentices to be captured. At this point the perspective switches to see more of the field outside the castle. In this mode, the cursor lays mines, the object of which is to destroy the dragon holding your apprentice. While doing so, the sorcerer has the opportunity to run around collecting the gold, but is vulnerable to the fiery breath of the dragons. Getting flambéed by the dragons, or losing three apprentices results in Game Over.

Collect enough gold, and you move to another level with even more aggressive enemies.

127511.name: T-Rex and Muscle Sam: Big Trouble in Smashing Potatoes Federation
127511.description:
T-Rex and Muscle Sam big trouble in S.P.F. is a freeware graphic adventure developed with Adventure Game Studio 3.1.2, and released in english and italian.
In this game, T-Rex and Muscle Sam are the world tag team champions of the S.P.F wrestling federation, and during an interview someone turn-off the light and stole his championship belts.
The two wrestler must search in every room of the backstage and talk with all the other wrestlers for resolve puzzle and find the thief.

Source: The Developer Website.

127512.name: BreakThru!
127512.description:
Game box

Alexey Pajitnov, the mastermind behind Tetris®, now introduces BreakThru - a frenetic-paced puzzle that forces you to think fast. The fun starts with a clock and a solid wall of colored bricks. Eliminate the bricks by clicking on two or more neighboring bricks of the same color.

127513.name: Space Hunter (2010)
127513.description:
User Summary

-Space Hunter- is a freeware graphic adventure game developed with Adventure Game Studio 3.1.2 and released in english and italian.
Kolt is a bounty-hunter, but the criminals of the planet are more funny that dangerous.
One day, after a mission, someone dressed like Kolt, free al the criminals of the Trashopolis prison; and Kolt begun wanted by the police.
Kolt must leave the city and reach the desert, for find the best bounty-hunter of the history, Skar the Pumpkin.

127514.name: Where in America's Past is Carmen Sandiego?
127514.description:
game box

This exciting game turns history into a fast paced detective adventure. Join the ACME Detective Agency and chase the notorious Carmen Sandiego and her gang as they filch famous objects from America's past.

127515.description:
Mix Fix is a reaction game where you are trying to get rid of all your cards first.
In the beginning every player get six cards showing six symbols. There are 4 different symbols in this game (fish, ship, sheep, frog). In each round 4 dice are rolled. Each dice has one symbol on four sides plus two blank sides. The players must then quickly find a card which shows all rolled symbols. If a matching card is found the player has to put it quickly in the middle of the table and has to name all symbols. If all was correct the player gets rid of this card. If he has made a mistake (wrong card or misspelling) he has to take it back and gets a new card as penalty.
127515.name: Mix Fix

127516.name: Orcs Must Die! 2
videogameexpansion: Orcs Must Die! 2: Are We There Yeti?
Orcs Must Die! 2: Family Ties Booster Pack
Orcs Must Die! 2: Fire and Water Booster Pack
videogamehonor: 2013 D.I.C.E. Strategy Game of the Year Nominee
127516.description:
Orcs Must Die! 2 thrusts players and their friends back into battle against a terrifying mob of orcs and other monsters. With a redesigned spellbook, players will have a broader range of options to build a deadly arsenal of defenses. Investing hard-earned skulls in an enormous new upgrade system will allow players to cater to their favorite methods of burning, grinding, tossing, or dismembering orcs.

Orcs Must Die! 2 begins days after the ending of the original game. With the rifts closed and the magical Order dead, the War Mage finds himself suddenly thrust into a new battle against the mindless orc mob. He has a powerful, if questionable, new companion in the Sorceress, an ex-War Mage responsible for the destruction of the Order.

Source: The Publisher Website.

127517.name: Orc Raiders
127517.description:
Prosper the best way orcs know how ... RAID!

Each player controls a village of orcs led by a Shaman, Chieftain and Warlord. Each round, players take turns playing a secret number of orc grunts with one or more leaders in various regions. Raiding the human mines, forest camps, farms and port city provide resources and honor points. Attacking other orc villages provides honor points and mucks with the opponents' plans. Placing in one's own village allows the building of defenses, increasing population or training your leaders.

The game ends when the resource decks run out. The player with the most honor points wins.

127518.description:
This volume in Volko Ruhnke's COIN Series takes 1 to 4 players into the Afghan conflict of today’s headlines, this time in a unique collaboration between two top designers of boardgames on modern irregular warfare. A Distant Plain teams Volko Ruhnke, the award-winning designer of Labyrinth: The War on Terror, with Brian Train, a designer with 20 years' experience creating influential simulations such as Algeria, Somalia Interventions, Shining Path: The Struggle for Peru, and many others.

A Distant Plain features the same accessible game system as GMT's recent Andean Abyss and upcoming Cuba Libre but with new factions, capabilities, events, and objectives. For the first time in the Series, two counterinsurgent (COIN) factions must reconcile competing visions for Afghanistan in order to coordinate a campaign against a dangerous twin insurgency.

A Distant Plain adapts familiar Andean Abyss mechanics to the conditions of Afghanistan without adding rules complexity. A snap for GMT COIN Series players to learn, A Distant Plain will transport them to a different place and time. New features include:


Coalition-Government joint operations.
Volatile Pakistani posture toward the conflict.
Evolution of both COIN and insurgent tactics and technology.
Government graft and desertion.
Coalition casualties.
Returning Afghan refugees.
Pashtun ethnic terrain.
Multiple scenarios.
A deck of 72 fresh events.


... and more.

As with each COIN Series volume, players of A Distant Plain will face difficult strategic decisions with each card. The innovative game system smoothly integrates political, cultural, and economic affairs with military and other violent and non-violent operations and capabilities. Flow charts are at hand to run the three Afghan factions, so that any number of players—from solitaire to 4—can experience the internecine brawl that is today's Afghanistan.
127518.name: A Distant Plain
boardgamepodcastepisode: Board2Death Podcast Episode 5 - Introductions Round One
Episode 3 - Playtesting And Jamey Stegmaier Interview
Episode 47 -- Four Coins in a Fountain
GrogCast Season 2, Episode 13
I've Been Diced! Episode 49: 2013 in review
I've Been Diced! episode 51: The PrezCon 2014 edition
Three Moves Ahead 320: Game Designer Brian Train
Travis Gets Heavy - Ep. 1 - The COIN Series
Wild Weasel 3

127519.name: SPF: Road To Wastedmania
127519.description:
User Summary

SPF road to wastedmania is a classic freeware fighting game developed with 2D fighter maker 2002.
In this game the characters of the graphic adventure T-Rex and Muscle Sam big trouble in SPF, fight in a tournament for the SPF world heavyweight championship belt.
All the characters have a different ending in the story mode, the player can also in the arcade mode and the team battle mode.

127520.name: ShootMania: Storm
127520.description:
User Summary

The second game for Nadeo's ManiaPlanet platform, ShootMania: Storm brings the modular map design and user driven content features of the TrackMania series into the realm of the competitive FPS. The game includes seven official game modes (Melee, Royal, Battle, BattleWaves, Time Attack, Elite, Joust) though more can be created by users with the tools included.

127521.name: A Cat's Night
127521.description:
User Summary

A cat's night is a freeware graphics adventure game developed with Adventure game studio 3.2 and released in italian and english.
This game born in collaboration with an italian associaton for help the homeless cats.
The main character is Orazio, a big cat with a big heart.
A evil multinational corporation want to destroy the cattery for build a motorway and Orazio must find something that can save the cattery from the destruction.

127522.name: Miciosegone Grand Prix
127522.description:
User Summary

Miciosegone Grand Prix is an italian freeware racing game developed with rpgmaker XP.
In this game, the best racer of the galaxy, Hardley Race, use his dimensional teleporter for kidnapp some racers of the world of "Dovadula's Burn", "T-Rex and Muscle Sam" and "-Space Hunter-".
Hardley force them to compete in a racing tournament where the winner can challenge him for the "best in the universe" title.

127523.name: Cactus Strowberry Dance Revolution
127523.description:
User Summary

Cactus Strowberry Dance Revolution is an arcade dancing game developed with rpgmaker VX.
Cactus and his friend Bistian and Sminkio, go to visit the dancing museum of DancingCity.
But Bistian accidentally broke an ancient music coloumn and free the dancing demon, Pantaleon Duchacha.
Pantaleon force all the people of the city to dance and takes Sminkio and Bistian ase his servants.
Cactus must find all the coloumn shards for stop Pantaleon and free his friends.

127526.description:
In this game of magic and thievery you lead a small band of thieves that are roaming the streets of ancient Baghdad stealing fabled enchanted treasures. Show the prowess to lead your thieves and capture the most valued treasures, while driving your opponents into the guards. Do this and all the thieves will unite behind you as the leader of the Guild of Thieves!

The game is played on a grid of cards that players move their thieves over to select. These cards then become part of a players deck, which determines in what way their thieves are able to move. Eventually everyone cannot move any more, at which time the players count up their victory points to determine the winner.
127526.name: Guild of Thieves

127528.name: Meltdown Express
127528.description:
Meltdown Express is a nuclear plant escape game for two players. It uses a die in a non-luck way.

In turns, each player can move one of his three workers to get one of the three hatchways on the other side of the modular board. Each hatchway has different victory points.

You have to run hard and strategic to achieve the objective of not dying and score most points.

This game was made for the II "Imprimir y Jugar" contest of the spanish blog "Jugando en Pareja" and got de second position.

127529.name: Chess (Mobile)
127529.description:
Summary

This is full featured chess game that supports wide variety of Blackberry devices and has very strong AI engine on the highest difficulty level (which is not recommended for junior players). We have added 100 exciting chess puzzles sorted by difficulty from easiest to hardest. Challenge yourself!

Overview

Chess is a board game played between two players. It is played on a chessboard, which is a square-checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid. At the start, each player controls sixteen pieces: one king, one queen, two rooks, two knights, two bishops, and eight pawns. The object of the game is to checkmate the opponent's king, whereby the king is under immediate attack (in "check") and there is no way to remove or defend it from attack on the next move. (wikipedia.org)

TIP: To castle, select king and move 2 cells left or right. If castle move is legal, you will see possible moves to cells next to ajacent one.

Source: The Publisher Website.

127530.name: FLOverload
127530.description:
FLUSH OR BE FLUSHED. Time is now your enemy. Beat the clock and complete your plumbing, touch the clock and it flushes the level. But if you run out of time, the clock flushes you.

Source: The Publisher Website.

127531.name: Light Riders
127531.description:
Light Riders is a lighting fast multiplayer game that challenges you to outlast your opponents over Wi-Fi technology. The longer you survive, the more points you earn creating your own legacy in the game. As you race your light cycle across the playing field, you'll leave behind an energy trail so hot that neither you nor your opponents can pass over it, which creates an additional challenge to game play.

Source: The Publisher Website.

127533.name: Angry Birds: Space
127533.description:
This game one of the many games in the Angry Birds Series.

With the Angry Birds: Space Game you will build, blast, and lift off with an exciting skill-and-action game based on the best-selling digital app, Angry Birds in Space. The egg-stealing pigs are out of this world, and the Angry Birds have followed to get their revenge! Players draw a space mission card and build the structure shown before their opponents launch an Angry Bird in an attempt to knock it and the pigs down to win points. Break open the pig's helmet for a bonus! Cards include four levels of difficulty including freestyle.

127535.name: Ich lerne...Englisch
127535.description:
German game for young children to enhance their early English language skills.

Six player boards are included and 36 tiles, each representing a common English word and the associated image.

Two games are described. The first is Englische Bildpaare suchen, a version of Pairs or Memory. You don't use the boards. Instead, turn all the tiles face down and lay them out on the table. Children must find the pairs, which are not two of the exact same image but instead, two tiles that 'go together'. Examples: Cow and Milk, Jacket and Trousers, and so on. If you 'match' a pair, you take the two tiles. When all the tiles are matched, the player with the most tiless, wins.

The second game uses the player boards and is played like Picture Bingo or Lotto. The first player to complete a line of three images is the winner.

127537.name: Na Sowas!
127537.description:
Young children's memory game.

The first player lays out six tiles where all the players can see them. Then each tile is covered with a wooden block.
Now, a die with six coloured faces is rolled and the first player announces the tile they think is under the block with the same colour as the die roll. The block is lifted and the tile beneath is checked. If the player was correct, they can continue with another turn. If the player was wrong, then the turn passes to the next player in a clockwise direction.

When all six tiles have been correctly named, six more tiles are revealed, studied and covered by the blocks again. When all 30 tiles have been collected, the player with the most tiles, wins.

127538.name: Bloodline Champions
videogamehonor: 2009 Swedish Game Awards Game of the Year Winner
127538.description:
'Bloodline Champions' is a free-to-play online player vs. player arena game where players engage in short, intense battles of up to ten players divided into two teams. Each player must take control over one of several different bloodlines, each with their own unique weapons and abilities. Easy to learn, challenging to master - 'Bloodline Champions' is just as much fun for the casual player as it is for the hardcore gamer.

We at Stunlock Studios, the developer of 'Bloodline Champions', made it our number one goal to make the ultimate PvP arena game. That meant doing away with chance, random elements, target locking and critical hits. Here player skill and team play is the most important factor to win.

Different bloodlines in a set up complements each other, different maps and game modes need different tactics, and good teamwork is important. Spells travel towards where the player aim their mouse cursor, and can be avoided by enemy players, making every ability dependent on individual player skill. There is no mana and the cooldowns are short, ensuring that every match is full of intense, adrenaline-filled action.

Experience intense, adrenaline-fueled multiplayer battles with thousands of other players. Short matches ensure you will never get stuck in a long drawn out game - great for quick bursts of fun!

Grinding, bases, levels and gold - you'll find none of that in a match! Just pure, exciting, all-out player vs. player battles where you and your skill is all that matters!

Choose your character from a total of twenty two (22) Bloodlines, each with their own abilities and specialities. From the fire-wielding Igniter to the elusive Ranid Assassin, each offers a unique experience!

Easy to learn, difficult to master. Direct controls, cursor-basedaiming, focused characters and an easy-to-learn interface allows you to enjoy Bloodline Champions just minutes into your first battle!

Thanks to a robust matchmaking system you will be off onto the fields of battle immediately after joining. Play up to five versus five battles, either with strangers automatically matched to your level or with a team of your best friends!

Keep an eye on your progression using an in-depth stat tracking system that allows you to review your own as well as other players' effectiveness with different tactics, abilities and bloodlines.

Short and intense battles, focus on player skill, and an elaborate stat-tracking system makes Bloodline Champions perfect for competitive gaming.

Vibrant graphics, a unique art style and a superb sound design brings the world of Bloodline Champions to life as you keep yourself busy with dealing out death and destruction.

Source: The Developer Website.

127539.name: Wer hat den Schatz?
127539.description:
The 25 tiles are laid out face-down. In a turn, a player rolls both the dice. Now he must choose one of the tiles which contains both colours that were rolled. Each card is a combination of two colours, the background color and the object colour.

If a player is correct, he takes the card. If not, he must replace it face down in the same position it was when he chose it.

When all the cards are taken, the player with the most tiles wins.

A variant for older children is included. In this game, the various tiles have a points value and the winner is the player with the most points, not neccessarily the player who has the most tiles.

127540.name: Das kleine Ich bin Ich: Memospiel
127540.description:
The game consists of 16 book tiles which have text on one side and one to three illustrations from the children's classic on the other, and 42 picture tiles matching the illustrations on the book tiles.
The picture tiles are placed on the table, face down. The book tiles are sorted and the first one is flipped over. The players then take turns flipping over a picture tile. If it matches the illustration, the active player can keep it and goes again. If there is more than one illustration on the book card, though, the matching tile stays on the table until all illustrations are found - the player to find the last one can keep them all. The game ends when all illustrations have been found. The player with most tiles is the winner.

127541.name: Roundup
127541.description:
A filler type old-style card game where you draw 1, play 1 to claim steer cards. Whoever has the most steer cards when the deck (45 cards) is depleted and all cards are played out (from 3 card hands) wins. You can claim a steer card directly by playing a Bar X card, or claim someone's steer card / Bar X stack by playing a Rustler, or claim someone's steer card / Bar X / Rustler stack by playing a Deputy.

The rules say it's best played with 2, 3, or 4 players, but 5 or 6 may play if desired.

127543.name: King of Kings
127543.description:
Publisher blurb: "Players become the emperors/kings of empires/kingdoms of the ancient world. This may appear to be a wargame, but there are numerous roads to victory, as the use of trade and economic advancement is just as likely to prevail, in the end, as territorial expansion and conquest."

King of Kings includes 15 scenarios set from 1700 BC to 1200 AD, ranging from 1 to 5 players. A ruler can try to increase his empire by conquest, increase wealth by trade, or invest in civilisatory improvements that may well be a better path to victory than warfare. Trade is handled by caravans moving from resource areas back to the heart of your empire. As the design notes say, "this is not a wargame".

If players desire, battles can be fought in detail, by using the rules from Good Industries' other game, Ancients. Calls for Divine Intervention, as well as finding out the personal characteristics of your partner in Royal Marriages add to the colour of the game. The game end is variable, depending on the death of monarchs, which can be sudden (although it is possible in principle to continue playing as one's heir).

Reimplementation by Imperator, which replaced the hex-based map with area movement.

127544.name: Pocket Quiz: Denkolympiade
127544.description:
This is a small, pocket-sized trivia game. It contains 50 cards with confusing and challenging puzzles to think and thinking around the corner. The backside of each card contains the answers.

Solve the puzzle first and get the card. Player with the most cards at the end of the game wins the game.

High performance sport for your brain: Clever puzzles, lateral thinking, concentration exercises, puzzles, logical thinking.

127545.name: Gregs Tagebuch: Mir Stinkt's!
127545.description:
Game description from the publisher:

In the fast-paced card game Gregs Tagebuch: Mir Stinkt's!, you want to pass the stinky cheese curse around as quickly as possible, while also ridding yourself of cards. Whoever runs out of cards first wins the round, and whoever scores the most points after nine rounds wins the game!

127546.description:
This is a small, pocket-sized trivia game. It contains 50 cards with puzzles to solve. The backside of each card contains the answers.

Give your mind a couple of workouts! Logic puzzles, 3D functions, word games, memory training and quizzes will prepare the mind and improve your memory and concentration skills! The ultimate fitness workout for the mind!

Solve the puzzle first and get the card as a point.
Player with the most points at the end of the game is the winner.
127546.name: Pocket Quiz: Mind-Marathon

127547.name: CaveSlayers
127547.description:
From Introduction:

La notte sta calando. Il Custode del Fuoco esce dalla sua grotta impugnando un ramo acceso. Tuo fratello, Corre-Veloce, difensore della tribù, è di guardia su una roccia, con la lancia in mano, insieme a un paio di altri Guerrieri. il Capo e le sue due figlie minori stanno preparando la carne di due cervi che i cacciatori della tribù hanno catturato nel pomeriggio - stanotte
ci sarà cibo in abbondanza per tutti!

Lepre Saltante, la moglie più anziana del capo, prende un po’ della carne - un paio di anni fa ha scoperto un modo per farla durare più a lungo, affumicandola e preparandola con erbe e sale. Porta nella capanna del fumo un intero quarto. Non importa, due cervi sono tanti. Ora il giorno è quasi finito. Bufalo d’Acqua, lo Sciamano, esce e siede tra te e Sputacchio, l’altro suo apprendista, e fa un cenno. Tu, Sputacchio e lo sciamano cominciate a cantilenare una preghiera, perché il sole torni a sorgere domani mattina. Finito il canto, le figlie del capo portano la carne al fuoco. Qualcuno inizia a danzare. In lontananza un lupo ulula la sua fame, ma sai che il falò lo terrà lontano tutta la notte.

From publisher blurb:

Siamo troppo buoni? Siamo troppo buoni. CaveSlayers vi permetterà di ambientare le vostre avventure nell'età della pietra, e per di più potrete scegliere voi il livello di realismo - che sia l'età della pietra storica o quella fantasy in cui i cavernicoli se la vedono con i dinosauri a suon di clava.

Signore, signori e Neanderthal... a voi il divertimento!

Una nota per evitare le critiche:
CaveSlayers non è un trattato di storia. Mentre le parti storiche sono abbastanza realistiche, abbiamo preferito mantenere un tono fantastico di sottofondo. Ma avete tutti gli elementi necessari e, con pochissimo lavoro di limatura, potete eliminare tutte le parti "ucroniche", ambientando il gioco in una precisa epoca storica (consigliamo caldamente il Pleistocene, l'epoca in cui l'uomo si è evoluto allo stato attuale...).



Translation courtesy of Google:Night is falling. The Keeper of the Fire out of his cave, holding a branch on. Your brother, Corre-Fast, defender of the tribe, is on call on a cliff, with spear in hand, along with a couple of other Warriors. the Chief and his two younger daughters are preparing the meat of two deer hunters of the tribe were captured in the afternoon - tonight there will be plenty of food for everyone!

Jumping Hare, the senior wife of the head, takes a bit of the flesh - a couple of years ago he found a way to make it last longer, affumicandola and preparing it with herbs and salt. Bring in the hut of smoking an entire quarter. No matter, two deer are plentiful. Now the day is almost over. Water buffalo, the Shaman, comes out and sits between you and sputtered, his other apprentice, and nods. You, sputtered, and the shaman began to chant a prayer, for the sun to rise back tomorrow morning. After the singing, the daughters of the head carrying the fuel to the fire. Someone begins to dance. In the distance a wolf howls his hunger, but you know that the fire will keep him overnight.

We're too good? We're too good. CaveSlayers will allow you to set your adventures in the stone age, and most importantly you can choose the level of realism - that is the stone age or the historical fantasy in which the cave if they see with dinosaurs to the sound of club.

Ladies, gentlemen and Neanderthals ... to you the fun!

A note to avoid criticism:
CaveSlayers is not a treaty in history. While the historical parts are quite realistic, we have preferred to keep a tone of great background. But you have all the necessary elements, and with very little work filing, you can delete all the parties "ucroniche", settling the game in a specific historical period (I highly recommend the Pleistocene, the epoch in which man has evolved to the state now ...).

127548.name: Pocket Quiz: Impressionismus
127548.description:
This is a small, pocket-sized trivia game. It contains 50 cards with 3 questions each, most of them with multiple choice options. The backside of each card contains the answers and offers additional information. Most of the cards also show small illustrations.

Test your knowledge on the subject of Impressionism! Everything to know about the most famous painters of this period and your world-famous works.

Answer the question correctly first and get the card.
Player with the most cards at the end of the game is the winner.

127549.description: The game is based on a German TV show. The goal is to collect Jetset points. To obtain these, the players travel and shop or pass and pick up money. Random events occur (determined by event cards) when several players play travel cards of the same color. After the last event card has been used up, the game ends and the player with most Jetset points is the winner.
127549.name: Die Geissens

127550.name: Extreme Edge Volume Two, Issue Ten
127550.description:
From the back of the PDF


The Bleeding Edge!

Is it a magazine for showing Hot Chicks doing Extreme Sports? Or is it a secret communication to the warriors in the battle for the future and destiny of mankind?

Kale Fleigh, the enigmatic editor of Extreme Edge Magazine, isn't telling. But with any luck, the information in these pages will save the lives of some adventurers, or at least give them the chance to go down fighting!

In this issue...

Cover Girl Cynthia Landry: Model, Spokes-woman, Mage, and More!
We Review the Kohl Armories Broadsword NC!
Fifi Fleigh-Blazes reviews the Ishitawa Sento Suit!
State of the World: Alliances
Editorial: “Who’s Got Your Back?”




When you live on the Extreme Edge, you're always a razor blade's width away from catastrophe... and you need a magazine that understands you. Welcome to the Extreme Edge!

(This is a supplement for Hot Chicks: The Roleplaying Game. You will need the Core Rulebook to play.)

127552.name: Die Mix-Max-Piraten
127552.description:
There are 20 illustrated cards with body parts of a pirates and 20 text cards. Now we have to roll the dice, take a word card, properly read and look closely: Should it be the pirate with a mustache or beard with? With sabers or with the saw? With this fun card game to practice first-graders to read and understand exactly what has been read correctly.
Be the quickest the recognize the illustrated card.

Sierra Devonshire reviews the Orb of Privacy!
Sierra’s Words of Warning!

When you live on the Extreme Edge, you're always a razor blade's width away from catastrophe... and you need a magazine that understands you. Welcome to the Extreme Edge!

(This is a supplement for Hot Chicks: The Roleplaying Game. You will need the Core Rulebook to play.)

127560.name: Undead Jungle
127560.description:
This game is a turn-based multiplayer adventure game featuring all the excitement of an adventure through the jungle with the added intensity of bloodthirsty zombies! A humerus board games that is simple and appropriate enough for the whole family to play, and strategic enough for any gamer to enjoy. In undead jungle players must battle their way through Dr. Manvils treacherous jungle watching out for zombies, bees, hippos, a tiger, and much more.
In Undead jungle players will be taking turns fighting their way through the jungle, during a players turn they will spend one of their four action points to do a number of things including attacking other players or jungle terrors, climbing trees for safety, scouring the land for item cards, and racing toward Dr. Manvil's sword. Once every player has used their actions the first player *Which alternates* draws a jungle event card. On the jungle event cards are both good and bad events. Animals and zombies move, items are found and lost, and much more. Once the jungle event card has been done, pass the first player token and repeat. The object of the game is to arrive back to Dr. Manvil's laboratory with his sword.

boardgameintegration: Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Alliance
Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Alliance
127561.description:
Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Mercenaries, a stand-alone game that also functions as an expansion for any Resident Evil DBG title, brings the Mercenaries theme to life, giving your characters brand new Skill cards to be used in any style of play. Draft Skill cards at the beginning of a game to give your Character a completely different play style.

Your character will learn from those failures and successes as you continue to play, using that experience to activate the Skills they have to give them an edge in battle.

Mercenaries also introduces three different Mansions with three different challenges. Will you face the unruly Ganados horde, the creepy Illuminados, or the onslaught of Majini? Each Mansion attacks the player in a different way, leaving a multitude of combinations for ultimate replay value!

Content:
275 cards
30 card dividers

Integrates with:

Resident Evil Deck Building Game
Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Alliance




Expanded by:

Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Outbreak
Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Nightmare
127561.name: Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Mercenaries

127562.name: Come Hell or High Water
127562.description:
From the front cover:

What evil machinations lie hidden in the flooded depths of ancient Kharnos Dzin? Whispers in the dark summon the uninitiated ... as evil brews beneath the surface of a dead city. Great rewards lie in store, but will adventurers find more than they had bargained for?

127563.name: Fairplay by Spiel
127563.description:
A community taboo word/word-category card is placed on the table (e.g., money or curse words), and each player gets a card of secret goal words. Points are claimed by catching opponents saying words featured on either the community card or a goal card.

Published in Fairplay magazine, issue 100.

127564.name: Rapigrama
127564.description:
The game has 13 letter dice that players roll up to three times, trying to form a crossword with them before a sand timer runs out. When a player is done or time runs out, they score the value of the words minus the value of unused dice. First one to reach an agreed score (usually 200 points) wins the game.

A classic since the late '70s - early '80s, Rapigrama remains one of the most popular boardgames in Argentina, sold in every toy store and supermarket.

127566.name: Theatrhythm Final Fantasy
127566.description:
Theatrhythm Final Fantasy is a rhythm video game. Players take control of four Final Fantasy characters, and select a Final Fantasy game from the first Final Fantasy to Final Fantasy XIII. Each game has three stages: field, battle, and event. Each stage features different game mechanics than the others; once a stage is completed, the characters level up. The difficulty level can be changed in order to make it appealing to "beginners and rhythm masters alike". Throughout the game, players can unlock music and movie scenes. The gameplay requires players to tap on the screen in correct spots to the beat of the music playing. Within the main game section "Series Mode", there are 3 unique stage styles: Field (Overworld) Music, Battle Music, and Event (Dramatic) Music, as well as the option to play through the opening and ending themes.

Source: Wikipedia, "Theatrhythm Final Fantasy", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

127567.name: -(Mathul8)^2
127567.description: The first expansion to Mathul8. Addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division not enough for you? Well now you can play the same great game with negatives, parenthesis, and exponents.

127568.name: Fracul8
127568.description:
Want to increase your math skills even more? Or you're just crazy because you like fractions? This is the expansion for you. Oh wait this is a stand alone expansion playable alone, with Mathul8 or any of its expansions.

Integrates with:

Mathul8

127569.description: Another expansion of the awesome game Mathul8. Need more practice with variables? Not only do you play variables but you can also change their value before using them.
127569.name: Vari8

127570.description: Another expansion to the classic game Mathul8. This expansion lets you add in those nasty radicals and logarithms. Some people actually think it is fun to play with radicals and logarithms. The exciting thing is that you get those choose your index number on your radicals or the base number on your logarithms.
127570.name: Radic8

127571.name: Into the FarDeep
127571.description:
From the front cover:

The path of the delver leads deep into the ancient Bitter Root Mountain. Deep in the heart of the dwarven mine, Kharnos Dzin, a secret is unfolding. Will the adventurers find the trail of Gilban Pembrooke, the famous dungeon delver? What dark motives lie hidden from the light? Great dangers and the chance for great rewards await those who enter the FarDeep... GT3 Into the FarDeep is the third and final adventure in the Gate series, in which the PCs must find and rescue a famous adventurer well past his prime. Knightvision Games invites you to explore the mysteries of the FarDeep and chart your own course to high adventure!

127572.name: Battleship Live
127572.description:
The BATTLESHIP LIVE game is only available at toy and game retailers in Australia, France and Canada, and through select online retailers in the United States.

Go live! In this fun version of the classic BATTLESHIP game, the electronic talking tower calls the plays! With motion sensing, sound effects and even surprise game-changing events, the tower guides the game from start to finish while you plot your strategy and command your ships. Launch the spy plane to spot your enemy and use your ship’s special powers to sweep for mines, launch air attacks, fire missiles and more. With so many things to do, this “naval battle” is more thrilling than ever!

Players issue commands by placing the round command peg on the fire, move, spy plane or special power locations on the board.
Then you confirm the command by covering both confirm buttons.
The voice commamd tower will do the rest and guide the game from start to finish.

127573.name: Whirlwind of Vietnam
127573.description:
On March, 8, 1965 the first troops of the US Marine Corps landed on the territory of Southern Vietnam. It was the beginning of a new confrontation between Saigon government and The Liberation Army of Vietnam. During this war the American troops were using not only new weapons, but new battlefield postures as well. One of the most noticeable changes was the extensive use of military helicopters both for transportation and fire support in landing zones.

The war in Vietnam became the first military conflict where helicopters played a significant role. Even now the image of the American helicopter Huey is one of the symbols of the operation in Indo-China. One is likely to come across the legendary Huey in every reconstruction of the above-mentioned events, whether this is a movie, a book or a computer game.

The game covers the events in November 1965, the operation in the Ia Drang Valley. Players will have a chance to pilot the helicopter (a gunship featuring maneuverability and fire power) and perform different types of tasks including attack and destroy, infantry support, rescue and many others. Gamers will be able to choose between different aircrew members at any time becoming the pilot or gunner as the AI takes over any unmanned positions. Flexibility is key as multiple settings allow varied flight behavior for the helicopter from realistic to arcade. This makes the game interesting for both hardcore gamers and casual players.

Whirlwind of Vietnam features all the major weapons and military equipment of that period, both air and land from firearms, grenade launchers and artillery to planes and vehicles on both sides of the conflict.

Key Features:
-Story based on the events of the military campaign in the Ia Drang Valley in November 1965
-Different positions in the helicopter crew - pilot, co-pilot, gunner
-Unprecedented level of details - helicopters, vehicles, equipment, human models and environment
-Various mission types: fire support, fire coordination, enemy search and destroy
-Autopilot mode allows to change view and watch the course of the game
-Engine-powered cut-scenes
-Real Vietnam locations
-Persistent non-playable characters accompanying player (crew), skills development

Minimum System Requirements
Operating System: Windows XP
Processor: Pentium IV 2 GHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM
Video card: 3D video adapter with 128 MB RAM
Sound card:
Hard disc: 2 GB HDD free space (+ 500 MB for a swap file of Windows and game saves)
CD ROM: 4x DVD-ROM drive

Source: The Developer Website.

127574.name: The Regent's Tower
127574.description:
From Introduction:

Quest: Kill the evil regent.
Bonus: Rescue the abducted.

127575.name: The Ruined Temple
127575.description:
From Introduction:

Adventures needed!
Help save the Venrith city temple from desecration and, destruction!
Defeat Airm and Shan in the temple and the city will pay your party 300 gp!

Quest: Save the priests.
Bonus: Kill every monster to sanctify the temple.

127576.name: The Harpy Caverns
127576.description:
From Introduction:

Adventures needed!
Help save the Lumouin city farmlands from harpies!
Defeat the harpy queen and her brood in their nest for the reward of 100 gp for each adventurer in your party!

Quest: Kill the harpy queen.
Bonus: Destroy all eggs.

127577.name: The Thieves Den
127577.description:
From Introduction:

Adventures needed!
City thieves have stolen from the king of Istamere!
250 gp for the head of the king of thieves. And, 50 gp per stolen item returned to the king.

Quest: Kill the thief king.
Bonus: Retrieve the stolen items.

127578.name: Jirum's Harem
127578.description:
From Introduction:

Adventures needed!
Young maids of Talmin have been taken by a noble named Jirum.
100 gp for Jirum's head. And 25 gp for each girl returned!

Quest: Kill Jirum.
Bonus: Rescue the abducted girls.

127579.name: Wereshark in the Moonlight
127579.description:
From Introduction:

Our heroes arrive at a decrepit old home, on an over cast night. Sitting on the front steps to the entrance is a young boy. He is sobbing and holding a dagger.
"I have come here to kill the beast that has killed my family...but I am afraid to go by myself."

127581.description:
Locust Horde is an additional army for Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation which can replace the Sauron player's units. This is a thematic expansion which refers to the theme of Gears of War. Each unit has it own special ability which refers to actual abilities of units in the Gears of War.

This game is made available as a print and play expansion for Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation and may not be produced for commercial reasons.
127581.name: Locust Horde (fan expansion for Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation)

127582.name: Harmonious Swarm
127582.description:
From the Publishers Site:

A brand new clan for Wu Xing: The Ninja Crusade, only now surfacing in the wake of the Empire’s silly crusade. The Harmonious Swarm is the Izou answer to the Grim Creepers, specialists in techniques that allow them to conform to society and manipulate insects.

Includes:

Complete clan write-up for the Harmonious Swarm
A unique wushu path, the Way of the Hive Life

127583.name: Wicked Quills
127583.description:
From Publishers Website:

Take a look at one of the lost clans for Wu Xing: The Ninja Crusade that fight for their own survival outside of the Ninja Crusade or Blossom Uprising. The Wicked Quills specialize in techniques that manipulate hair, using their locks as weapons and tools in their on going struggle for dominance.

Includes:

Complete clan write-up for the Wicked Quills
A unique wushu path, the Way of the Piercing Jacket

127585.name: Take Off
127585.description:
The object of the game is to collect a set of route cards between New York City and San Francisco. So going from east to west the set would be New York, Cleveland, Omaha, Salt Lake City, and San Fransisco. A player can play a "Motor Trouble" or a "Land For Gas" card on his opponent's stack to force the other player to play a "Take Off" before he can resume his route.

The 32 cards are New York (4), Cleveland (4), Omaha (4), Salt Lake City (4), and San Francisco (4). In addition there are 6 "Take Off" cards, 2 "Motor Trouble" cards, and 4 "Land for Gas" cards.

127586.name: Grandmama's Arithmetical Game
127586.description:
In 1887 the McLoughlin Brothers introduced a successful series of educational card games under the name "Grandmama's XXX Game." The series included card games on Arithmetic, Bible Studies, Geography, Riddles. and Useful Knowledge.

One player was designated the "preceptor" and the other players were "scholars." The preceptor would ask questions and go around the players until someone got the question right. Most right answers wins.

"Grandmama's Arithmetical Game" card game had 119 question cards, an instruction sheet, and an answer booklet which were packaged in a paper covered cardboard box.

127587.name: Wer wird Frühstücks-König?
127587.description:
Who will be the Breakfast-King? A game with a message for children - eat wisely.

The board features a pathway with white, yellow, orange and blue spaces. If you land on any colour other than white, you must draw a card from the deck of that colour. The cards either tell you something positive or something negative. Examples:
Blue card - Bad choice of meal, hamburger with Pommes Frites. This is 'not good' so you have to go back three spaces.
Orange card - various breakfasts you might have. A healthy one illustrated, might move you forward two spaces.
Yellow card - Cleaning your teeth after a meal - very good, go forward two spaces

In addition, some cards show an activity that must also be obeyed. This will be one of four instructions:
3 x three jumps on the spot.
1 x run round the table
1 x hop round the table
1 x stand on one leg and count to 10

The winner is the first player to reach the end of the track and a crown is included for the victor to wear.

The game was published for the Zentralverband des Deutschen Bäckerhandwerks, a kind of organisation to promote different German bakeries.

127588.name: Benjamin Blümchen: Einkaufen macht Spaß
127588.description:
Benjamin Blümchen says "Shopping is fun".

Each player gets a board with 16 squares, all illustrated with things Benjamin needs at the supermarket. The item tiles are shuffled and placed in a face-down stack. A turn starts when the player reveals the top tile. If he thinks he needs it, he pays to the bank the cost (in Deutschmarks). If he doesn't want to buy it, the next player can, and at a saving of 50 Pfennigs (half a Deutschmark). If not wanted it is offered to all the other players, knocking off 50 Pfennigs each time. If it gets down to zero, that player will get it for free.

The object is to buy goods that will form four boxes in a row on your board, so four across, four down and four corner-to-corner are all acceptable choices. The first to do so, wins.

A few tiles are what you might call Event tiles. If one of these is drawn, it is read out and takes place if the drawer wants to make use of it. Example: You may take one item off the board of the player to your left.

127589.description:
A dark shadow has fallen upon the Slavic lands. The powerful amulet of Slavika, which has protected the inhabitants since the death of the prince, is now powerless. The ruler's only child, his daughter, is still too young to bind herself with the amulet and take on the family burden. A few months remain until the day of the ritual – and until the daughter of the prince fills the amulet with her lifeforce, the ruling families themselves must protect the population against the evil creeping out of the swamps and caves. The family which best performs this task will gain the privilege of marrying one of their sons to the young princess, who will soon be bound to the amulet and will possess the tremendous power of Slavika.
In Slavika, players are the heads of powerful families in the fantastic world of Slavika. Each player has six heroes, who will be sent to different regions, where they will fight monsters threatening the villagers. The more a player's heroes help defeat the monsters, the more glory is won for their family. The game lasts several months, until the princess is able to complete the ritual and renew the power of the amulet. At that time the family with the most glory points earns the right to the hand of the princess and wins the game.

Integrates with:

Slavika: Equinox
127589.name: Slavika

127590.name: Movie Trailer
127590.description:
In Movie Trailer, players take turns being the director and teasing one another with clues about a movie they have in mind.

In a round, the active player (a.k.a. the director) chooses a movie title and writes it down in secret. She then chooses one of the genre tiles to provide a first clue as to what the movie is. The player to her left is the spectator, and if no one guesses the movie, the spectator chooses one of three groups of clue tiles, from which the director chooses one and offers it to all as the next clue, with players being able to guess in clockwise order, starting with the spectator. Whoever first guesses the movie in question earns points, with more points being awarded the earlier that the player guesses correctly. The director tries to choose a movie title that can be guessed not too early and not too late for she scores the most points if the title is guessed after four clues. If no one has guessed the title after seven clues, no one scores and the spectator becomes the new director.

After all players have been director at least once — or an equal number of turns in a longer game — the player with the most points wins.

127591.name: Debtbusters II
boardgamepublisher: Roosevelt Center for American Policy Studies
127591.description:
Educational game, designed to teach groups how to manage the federal budget over five years.

Not much fun here. It is extremely technical and comes with masses of forms, sheets, references, optional detail and teaching guides. Players are presented with a problem and must choose a way to improve the situation. If they are right, all well and good. If they are wrong, the results of their action are demonstrated.

The winning group are the ones who get the most decisions correctly.

127592.name: Der Schatz der Bannterra
127592.description:
From Introduction:

Ein Pergament mit den Koordinaten einer Insel und einem Reim soll zum Schatz der Bannterra führen. Angeheuert (10% des Schatzes/Kopf) - oder auf Eigeninitiative - gehen die SC an Land, um den Schatz der Bannterra auf der Tropeninsel zu finden.

Nördlich finde den süssen Wein und kehre zurück zu seinem Heim.
Beim gesunkenen Schiff im grünen Meer, wartet am Morgen hinter Fels der Redsame schon sehr.
Schließlich auf, zum Rand der Wellen aus Stein, halte aber von nun an trocken Deine Bein.
Dann hoch zur Treppe ohne Ende, nur Mundgold durchdringt Wände.
Doch nur ein Sklave kann bergen den Schatz, sonst wütet die Katz.


Translation courtesy of Google:

A parchment with the coordinates of an island and a rhyme to cause the ban to the treasure Terra. Recruited (10% of the treasure / head) - or on their own initiative - the SC go ashore to find the treasure of the ban on the tropical island of Terra.

North find the sweet wine and return to his home.
In the sunken ship in the green sea, waiting for the morning after the Redsame very rocky.
Finally, to the edge of the waves in stone, but from now on keep your legs dry.
Then up the stairs without end, only gold mouth permeates walls.
But only a slave can recover the treasure, otherwise the cat is raging.

127593.name: Ace of Hearts
127593.description:
From the PDF


Ol' Rose is dyin' of the Consumption.

Rose's House, the finest - and only - Cathouse in the town of Jezebel is up for grabs. It's every girl for herself and only one can earn the deed for the house and Rose's stash of gold all to herself

A rootin', tootin', moochin' adversarial Story Game
2+ players
No Games Master
Pack of Cards required.
Beads/poker chips required.

127594.name: Die Diebe vom Dämmerwald
127594.description:
From Introduction:

Immer häufiger kommt es an der Straße entlang des Dämmerwaldes zu Überfällen. Auf die vermutlich ein halbes Dutzend große Bande ist eine Belohnung von 50 Goldmünzen pro Kopf ausgesetzt. Man empfiehlt den Charakteren zum Pelzzacken zu ziehen, einer steilen, begehbaren Felsspitze inmitten des weiträumigen Dämmerwaldes, da sie von hier das gesamte Areal gut überblicken können und so vielleicht einen Anhaltspunkt finden.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Increasingly it comes down the road of Dämmerwaldes to assaults. Probably half a dozen of the big band, a reward is offered 50 gold coins per capita. It is advisable to draw the characters to the fur spikes, a steep, rocky peak amidst the spacious walk-Dämmerwaldes as they can from here overlooking the entire area well and find perhaps a clue.

127595.name: Der Tempel des Ark-Amon
127595.description:
From Introduction:

Nach einem tagelangen Sandsturm lichtet sich endlich der Himmel über Wüstenwacht und in etwa 6 Meilen Entfernung erkennt man nun mitten in der Wüste ein Bauwerk, dass lange Zeit unter dem heißen Wüstensand verborgen war und lauernd auf mutige Recken wartet, um von ihnen erkundet zu werden.


Translation courtesy of Google:

After a day-long sandstorm clears at last the skies above the desert watch and about 6 miles away can be seen now in the middle of the desert, a building that had long been hidden under the hot desert sand and lying in wait for brave warriors waiting to be explored by them.

127596.name: Die Hallen des Ark-Amon
127596.description:
From Introduction:

Dieser Dungeon ist die Fortsetzung zu Dungeon2Go 14: Der Tempel des Ark-Amon.

Hier und da kann man auf den Geist der Elfin Alyna treffen, die unaufhörlich fleht: “Bitte helft. Erlöst meine Schwestern von ihrem Leid und Kummer. Würdet Ihr das tun? Ein letzter Schlag? Bitte! Würdet ihr?” - Erst wenn man aufrichtig einwilligt, verschwindet Alyna.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This dungeon is the sequel to D2G14: The Temple of Amon-Ark.

Here and there one can encounter the spirit of the Elfin Alyna who prays ceaselessly: "Please help. Redeemed my sisters with their own grief and sorrow. Would you do that? A final blow? Please! Would you? "- Only when one agrees sincerely Alyna disappears.

127597.name: Dry Dock
127597.description:
From the Introduction:

The dry dock and the float out are still reasonably new innovations in the business of shipbuilding. Still this shipyard has decided to employ both in its new constructions. This particular dry dock currently houses the skeleton of a slightly larger cargo ship of a new design. Only a small part of its hull has been attached to keel and ribs as of yet, but barrels of tar and piles of boards are already waiting to be processed.

The dry dock is essentially a deep pit walled by expertly set stones. No stairs lead down. Only a number of wooden ladders allow access to its depths. Its floodgate is still a primitive construction of two walls of thick wooden beams sealed with tar drenched hemp. Still some water trickles through and collects in puddles in the dock from time to time. Thus it is a continuous effort to keep the dock dry.

127598.name: Dyad
videogamedeveloper: Right Square Bracket Left Square Bracket
videogamehonor: 2012 IndieCade Best Audio Design of the Year Winner
127598.description:
Experience a mind-bending, psychedelic sensory overload when Dyad hits PSN on July 17th! Blast through a reactive audio-visual tube creating a harmonious synthesis of color and sound as you hook, graze, and lance enemies to master Dyad's 27 unique levels.

Embark on an interactive transformative journey through Dyad's Game Mode campaign to prepare yourself for Trophy Mode's tactical freakout variations wherein a Platinum Trophy awaits only the most skillful. Or choose to sit back and chill with Dyad's hallucinogenic Remix Mode. Transcendence awaits!

Source: The Game Website.

127599.name: Die Asche der Drachen
127599.description:
From Introduction:

Die Asche der Drachen eignet sich dazu, zwischen Die Minen von Crimlak und Die Katakomben des Nekromanten gespielt zu werden, kann aber auch unabhängig davon irgendwo anders auf Caera angesiedelt werden.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The ashes of the dragon is adapted to be played between the mines and Crimlak The catacombs of the Necromancer, but can also be independently somewhere else located on Caera.

127600.description:
Objective: be the first reaching the target

- acting/moving by turn -
roll the die and use points to move your meeple and/or dig
- one point per movement/digging;
digging means => put slides on the board or move/turn them;
players may start with a certain no. of obstacles (danger cards - max. 6) which are going to spoil movement.
127600.name: Mucki Maulwurf gräbt sich durch!

127601.name: D&D 4e Combat Manager
127601.description:
From the website:

A Combat Manager for DnD 4th Edition (And Essentials). Keeps track of initiative order, status effects, and much more.

Paste Monsters directly from the (Offline) WotC Monster Builder using the Copy-to-Rich Text option
Load PCs directly from Character Builder Files
Shows full stat-blocks for every combatant on the main screen
Automatically saves a library of every entered monster/PC to speed preparation
Load and Save encounter rosters to save time at the table
Tracks most combat data for the GM:
Initiative order
Hit points (including temporary)
Power-expenditure (including recharge rolls)
Daily Item Usage
Lingering Effects
Saving Throws
Healing Surges

127602.name: Ganbare Goemon: Sarawareta Ebisumaru!
127602.description:
Ganbare Goemon: Sarawareta Ebisumaru! (がんばれゴエモン さらわれたエビス丸?, "Persevere Goemon: Kidnapped Ebisumaru!") is a Game Boy game and the first game in the series released in for a portable system in 1991. Gameplay is similar to Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Dōchū which was released on the Famicom. Only Goemon is playable, and the game consists of him rescuing Ebisumaru; Sasuke and Yae do not make appearances.

It was originally only released in Japan. In 1997 Konami started releasing the Konami GB Collection, a collection of four older Konami games re-released with Super Game Boy color palette and borders added. Goemon was released in Volume 2 in Japan. In 2000 they were again updated for the Game Boy Color, translated, and released in Europe, for several games it was their first release outside of Japan. For the European release the order for the games was altered so what was Vol. 4 in Japan became Vol. 2, with the Japanese Vol. 2 and 3 becoming Vol. 3 and 4. For the European port the title screen was changed to Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon, and just "Starring Goemon" on the game select screen since the most recent Goemon games released in Europe were Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon and Goemon's Great Adventure.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ganbare Goemon: Sarawareta Ebisumaru!", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

127603.name: Extratour- vier ins Eck, das ist der Gag
127603.description:
Objective: collect most winning points after a series of 3 games
- acting/moving by turn -
Both players place 7 coloured pieces alternately on a board - which shows 5 squares (16 triangles) - and move them;
player who forms a square scores 3 points (new game), 3 in a row 1 point (and may remove 1 opponent's piece from the board) until one player possesses 2 pieces only.

127604.name: Mensch pass auf
127604.description:
Objective: be the first to reach the target (field 48)

- moving by turn -
roll the die, move your meeple & follow instructions of the field you land on..
Equipment: board, 6 (hard working) meeples, 2 dice

127605.name: Resonance
127605.description:
When a brilliant particle physicist dies unexpectedly, the race is on to secure his terrible new technology before it falls into the wrong hands. The lives of four playable characters become entangled as they fight against the clock to find the dead scientist’s secret vault.

The suspicions they harbor, the memories they guard, the connections they share - all will converge as these four ordinary people work together to prevent a potentially cataclysmic disaster.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgamehonor: 2013 Origins Awards Best Historical Miniature Rules Supplement Nominee
127606.description:
The second army list supplement for the Hail Caesar miniatures wargame. The book is 84 pages printed in full color, with army composition guides, gaming stats and notes for 60 different armies from late antiquity through the early middle ages. Beautifully illustrated with full-color photos of ancient miniature armies.

Armies included:
- Palmyran
- Middle Imperial Roman
- Sassanid Persian
- Goths
- Early Saxon
- Franks
- Huns
- Late Imperial Roman
- African Vandals
- White Huns
- Gepids
- Spanish Visigoths
- Ostrogothic Italy
- Early Byzantine
- Lombards
- Scots-Irish
- Arthurian-British
- Welsh
- Merovingian Franks
- Avars
- Picts
- Khazars
- Arab Conquest
- Bulgars
- Tang China
- Thematic Byzantine
- Arab Empire
- Carolingian Franks
- Pecheneg
- Anglo Saxon
- Rus
- Vikings
- Almoravid Moors
- Fatamid Egypt
- Tagmatic Byzantine
- Al-Andalus
- Christian Spain
- Ghaznavid
- Liao China & Kara-Khitan Khaganate
- Norman
- Seljuk Turks
- Feudal French
- Feudal German
- Feudal Polish
- Early Hungarian
- Ayyubid Egyptians
- Sung China
- Italo-Norman
- Feudal Scots
- Early Russian
- Khwarazmian Persian
- Comnenian Byzantine
- Burid & Zengid Syria
- Japanese
- Plantagenet English
- Lombard League
- Crusaders
- Later Welsh
- Teutonic Crusaders
- Mongol
127606.name: Hail Caesar Army Lists: Late Antiquity to Early Medieval

127608.name: Ghosts in the Grid
127608.description:
Ghosts in the Grid is a 2 to 4 player card game, with the flexibility to combine two or more games to increase complexity and/or numbers of players. Create the “Grid” by arranging 35 random square tiles to create the playing field, play cards to advance your “Ghost” or thwart opposing players by hacking them with “Virus” cards.

Your goal is to retrieve the Data from the Central Node at all costs! Escape with it before opposing players hack your Ghost and the System assimilates you. Each player begins on opposite corners of the assembled Grid. You play Ghost cards on yourself to move towards the center and attempt to retrieve the Data, or put a stop to other players getting to the object by playing Virus cards on them. If you have too many Virus cards on your Command Row mat at once, you will be Assimilated and will have to start over again!

Do you think you have what it takes? Prepare yourself with Ghosts in the Grid!

Game Data:

Complexity: 3 on a 9 scale
Solitaire Suitability: 4 on a 9 scale
Scale: Each player represents a Ghost attempting to retrieve the Data (center tile).

127609.name: Nightmare Ned
127609.description:
the game features Ned as he travels through five different adventure portals into nightmare world such as The Graveyard, The Alcatraz Elementary School, The Medical Nightmare, The Attic, Basement and Beyond, and The Bathroom. You start at the Quilt, where you can choose from the 5 nightmare worlds. You only have 8 times to go to the Quilt, but there are secret passages in each portal that take you to another portal. There is one "shadow creature" for every world. Throughout these nightmares; by defeating creatures and completing small tasks, a small part of the shadow creature is revealed with 3 pieces for each. After each section is completed, the shadow creature becomes someone (or something) from reality who is connected with that issue. In the Graveyard Nightmare, the shadow creature turns into Ned's grandfather at the end, because Ned was worried about him dying. In the Medical Nightmare, the creature turns into a nurse named Dr. Klutzchnik. Ned was scared about getting sick and having to get a shot. In the Alcatraz Elementary School, the creature turns into Billy, a bully who just wanted to be friends with Ned. Ned simply wanted him to stop calling him "Melonhead". In the Attic, Basement and Beyond, the creature turns into a girl named Sally with a weird doll whom she calls "Sandy Patty Cake". She found it in the trash. Finally, in the Bathroom Nightmare, the creature turns into Ned's bathroom toilet who, in the nightmare, can talk. There are two endings to the game. The "bad" ending is when you use up all 8 "Quilt tries". Ned ends up still being scared of everything. The "good" ending is where Ned wakes up and isn't scared. As a result, the shadow creatures don't know what to do anymore.

Source: Wikipedia, "Nightmare Ned", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

127610.name: Blue Force
127610.description:
The player is a rookie police officer named Jake Ryan. Jake's father was a police officer, which prompted Jake to join the force. Jake's father was killed in the line of duty and his case has not yet been solved. While playing the game, Jake uncovers clues to his father's murder.

Jake graduates at the top of his class and joins the Jackson Beach PD, the same force his dad was on. He makes several arrests in connection with a National Guard armory break-in. Just as he is about to tie these crimes in with his father's murder, Jake is in a car accident while riding his police motorcycle. After spending weeks in rehab, his father's old partner offers him a job as his assistant in his private investigation firm, and Jake accepts. Eventually, the two discover a massive gun smuggling ring, tied to three main individuals: a man named Bradford Green, Stuart Cox, the Jackson Beach district attorney, and Nico, the person who murdered Jake's father. The game ends with Nico being sentenced to receive a lethal injection, Bradford Green being sentenced to 20 years in prison, and Stuart Cox being sentenced to 15 years in prison.

Source: Wikipedia, "Blue Force", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

127611.name: Body Maps
127611.description:
User Summary:

A system for generating precise hit locations. This item includes:

Two plastic sheets with six circles containing multiple numbered points, each circle is dedicated to an attack type ("hand-to-hand swing attacks" or "projectile attacks at ranges of 11 to 30 meters", etc.)

A four-page card stock cover with 32 silhouettes of people (and two dogs) in various positions with their body parts numbered.

When you overlay the appropriate circle with the appropriate silhouette, you can randomly generate hit locations.

127612.name: The Game (1990)
127612.description:
Checkers meets blackjack.

The goal is to get a game piece to the other side of the board, and score as close to 21 as possible without busting. Pieces can only with forward, with the exception of the Ace, which can also move backwards. If you have the opportunity to jump a piece, you are required to jump it.

127613.name: An den Ufern der Elbe
127613.description:
Objective: be the first turning back to Dresden (field 100)

- moving by turn -
each player rolls the die and moves according the number; ending on a red or blue space draw a corresponding card & follow instructions of the card.

127614.name: Was ist Was Österreich Quiz
127614.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, to culinary, recreational activities and history of Austria.

127615.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Schleswig-Holstein
127615.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, to culinary, recreational activities and history of Schleswig-Holstein the state of Germany.

127616.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, recreational activities and history of Nordrhein-Westfalen the state of Germany.
127616.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Nordrhein-Westfalen

127617.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Saarland
127617.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, recreational activities and history of Saarland the state of Germany.

127618.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Bremen
127618.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, recreational activities and history of Bremen the city and state of Germany.

127619.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Sachsen
127619.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, recreational activities and history of Sachsen the state of Germany.

127620.description:
Objective:
get most question cards finding correct answers
In his turn draw a card and give the correct answer;
if you are right keep card as bonus point.

64 question and answer cards, informative and curious about geography, politics, celebrities, recreational activities and history of Rheinland-Pfalz the state of Germany.
127620.name: Deutschland-Quiz: Rheinland-Pfalz

127621.name: Das Wissensduell: Rund um die Erde
127621.description:
This is a trivia game with questions around the world.
The game includes 100 cards with 100 Questions and answers (on the back side) and four clips in four colours used as player markers.

Players have to estimate facts for questions. There are always 10 different possible answers. There is a clip for each player to mark their answers on the card. Each spot with an answer can only be taken by one player. When all players made their estimations the card is flipped to the backside with the answer. The player with the correct answer or is closest to it gets the card. If theres a tie the next question/card is worth two cards (the old tied card and the next new card).
The first player with 7 cards is the winner.

127623.name: Sensory Powers
127623.description:
From the PDF


If knowledge is power, then so is the ability to perceive with senses far beyond those of ordinary people, to know things they do not. Sensory Powers delves into enhanced and extraordinary senses, as well as powers to limit the senses of others, and how to handle such sensory capabilities in game play

127624.name: Size & Mass Powers
127624.description:
From the PDF


Contrary to what they say, size does matter, but not necessarily in the ways you might think! From powerful giants to mighty mites, Size & Mass Powers looks at the very big and the very small, along with changes in mass and density and all the things you can do when you see the world from the perspective of a different size.

127625.name: Die Tonkrieger des Hoi-Ming
127625.description:
From Introduction:

Vor vielen Generationen herrschte der Tyrann Hoi-Ming über Shenming, die Hauptstadt von Kait im fernen Westen Caeras. Als er getötet wurde, tanzten die Menschen auf der Straße.
Der neue Herrscher ließ die Leiche mit dem Gesicht nach unten in einer Krypta unter dem Tempel des Kriegsgottes Kahol beisetzen. Zwischen der Krypta und den kleinen Katakomben der Kaholkirche, ließ er ein Mahnmal aus fünf Räumen errichten:
Ein Zentralraum mit einer Statue Hoi-Mings umringt von vier kleinen Hallen mit je 100 Kriegerstatuen aus Ton, die als Symbole für die vier Armeen Hoi-Mings unter der Erde bei den Toten eingesperr bleiben sollten.

Viele Jahre vergingen und Hoi-Ming und seine Tonarmee gerieten in Vergessenheit. Einzig die Anhänger Kahols gedachten noch regelmäßig dem großen Sieg. Das Mahnmal existiert noch heute.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Many generations ago there was the tyrant of Hoi-Ming Shenming, the capital of the Far West Caeras Kait. When he was killed, people were dancing in the streets.
The new rulers had the body with the face down into a crypt beneath the temple of the god of war Kahol buried. Between the crypt and catacombs of the small Kaholkirche, he built a memorial of five areas:
A central room with a statue Hoi-Ming surrounded by four smaller halls with 100 warrior statues, the barrier should remain on as symbols of the four armies Hoi-Ming's under the ground among the dead.

Many years passed and Hoi-Ming and his Tonarmee forgotten. Only the imaginary followers Kahols still regularly the great victory. The monument still exists today.

127626.name: Die Trollbrut vom Talbach
127626.description:
From Introduction:

Die Trollbrut vom Talbach eignet sich dazu, während oder nach Die Katakomben des Nekromanten gespielt zu werden.

Eine Trollbande aus den Drachenbergen hat sich unbemerkt in einer Höhle am Talbach - keine zwei Kilometer tromaufwärts von Crimlak - niedergelassen.

Die Charakter erhalten in Crimlak den Auftrag (beispielsweise durch Grum oder Gernot Breuker) nach fünf verschollenen zwergischen Minenarbeitern zu suchen, die seit 3 Tagen vermisst werden (pro gefundenem Zwerg ist man bereit, bis zu 20GM den Charakteren zu zahlen).


Translation courtesy of Google:

The troll-from the mountain stream is to be played during or after the Catacombs of the Necromancers.

A band of trolls in the mountains dragon has silently in a cave on the mountain stream - less than two kilometers from tromaufwärts Crimlak - established.

The character received in Crimlak the job (for example, Grum and Gernot Breuker) to search for five missing dwarven miners who went missing for 3 days (every detected dwarf one is willing to pay up to 20GM the characters).

127627.name: Der Geist der Spukmine
127627.description:
From Introduction:

Der Geist der Spukmine eignet sich dazu, vor oder während Die Katakomben des Nekromanten gespielt zu werden. Die Quelleninformationen aus Die Minen von Crimlak bzw. dem kostenlosen Download Crimlak und das Dreiental widmen sich den Minen des Dreientals.

Der alte Gerren war der Letzte, der blieb, als die Silbermine aufgegeben wurde, und schürfte hier noch bis ans Ende seiner Tage. Zuletzt kam er gar nicht mehr an die Oberfläche, wurde wirr und hütete nur noch eifersüchtig sein angebliches Silber sowie seine Mine. Er starb einsam, aber sein verrückter Geist spukt noch immer hier und ist Teil der Mine geworden.

Doch in Crimlaks Gasthäusern hält sich hartnäckig das Gerücht, man müsse nur dem alten Gerren und seiner tückischen Mine die Stirn bieten und kann dann den größten Silberschatz des Dreientals nach Hause tragen kann, was immer wieder Abenteurer zur alten Spukmine lockt.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The spirit of Spukmine is to play before or during the catacombs of the Necromancers to be. The source information from the Mines dedicate Crimlak or the free download and Crimlak Dreiental to the mines of Dreientals.

The old Gerren was the last one was, as the silver mine was abandoned and grazed here until the end of his days. Most recently, he no longer came to the surface, was confused and jealously guarded only be alleged, and his silver mine.
